HeyPiggy Review

Below is my HeyPiggy review.

What is HeyPiggy?

Whenever I test a new survey site, the first thing I look at is whether it’s actually legit. I don’t want you wasting your time on scams or sites that never pay out.

I can say that HeyPiggy is real – I tested it myself, and I could see actual surveys waiting for me on my dashboard. I liked that they were upfront about the payout for each survey and that you can see exactly how much you’ll make before you start.

How does HeyPiggy work?

If you’re brand new to survey sites, here’s how HeyPiggy works:

So, while you definitely won’t make big money with HeyPiggy, it can add up if you check in regularly and grab a few quick surveys when you have a few minutes to spare.

  • Better luck with short surveys: Personally, I had more success sticking with shorter surveys. I felt like I wasted less time and had a higher chance of actually finishing the survey and getting paid.

Overall, HeyPiggy is a legit site, but you have to go in with realistic expectations. If you’re hoping for easy money, you might get frustrated. But if you like having a small, flexible way to make a few extra bucks here and there, it can be worth adding to your list.

Cons:

Tips for making the most with HeyPiggy

If you decide to try HeyPiggy, here are a few tips to help you get the best experience:

  • Stick to shorter surveys – From my experience, the shorter surveys (like under 10 minutes) were better because I didn’t get kicked out as often.

So, would I recommend HeyPiggy? If you’re looking for an easy, flexible way to earn a little extra spending money during your downtime, HeyPiggy can be a good option to add to your list.
